properties.description: Let's Go Batty - Hoole Community Centre is opening its doors for a free activity on a Friday afternoon to the community for a social games of table tennis and the occasional game of pickleball (if you have never tried this sport it really is a must). The sessions are every Friday afternoon from 1:30 - 5:30pm and open to all big and small, any children must be accompanied by an adult. A fabulous warm space where you can meet lots of like minded people enjoy a game or two and have a tea or coffee.
